page.title: 09RECREATION
page.content: At the village hall a{playgroup}is held on Monday,Wednesday and Thursday mornings between 9:00 am and 12:00 pm. Preschool children make and play games.They play with "playdoh" and plasticine and they stick boxes and paint pictures.Then they sit down on benches or chairs and have a bottle of milk and a biscuit each.Each summer the play school goes on a day trip to a park. There is also a{"Mums and toddlers" group which copes with younger children,but their mums(or dads) stay with them to help them play,and they are there to comfort them if they begin to cry.
